This dish can be cooked by baking the fish and potatoes in the oven with some olive oil, salt, and pepper.

The most common way to cook fish and potatoes is to bake them in the oven. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit. Place the fish and potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and the potatoes are tender.
